title: Harmonize and load RWS environmental data
output: html_document
date: 
params:
  loadInDB: FALSE
  currentdate: !r Sys.Date()
---



```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(data.table)
library(leaflet)
```

# goal is to extract integrated pp from RWS files and export them
# into the database in "bewerkt"

```{r}

files <- list.files("../data/RWS/pelagic_pp/", pattern = "Westerschelde_PrimaireProductie", full.names = T)

# in this version, Deelgebied 9 was called Deelgebied 0

data <-  lapply(files, \(x) read_delim(x, delim = ";")) %>% 
  bind_rows()

```


```{r checkOnMap}

pal <- leaflet::colorFactor(palette = "RdYlBu", domain = data$Compartiment)

data %>% 
  filter(!is.na(XScanfish), !is.na(YScanfish)) %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("XScanfish", "YScanfish"), crs = 28992) %>%
  st_transform(4326) %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  leaflet::addCircleMarkers(radius = 2, stroke = 1,
    color = ~pal(Compartiment), 
    opacity = 1
    ) %>%
  leaflet::addLegend(
    position = "bottomright", 
    pal = pal, 
    values = data$Compartiment,
    opacity = 1)
```



```{r}

outData <- data %>%
  mutate(
    gebied = "Westerschelde",
    source = "Rijkswaterstaat",
    license = "CC0",
    method = "FRRF/scanfish",
    date_added = params$currentdate,
    script = "load_rws_environmentals.Rmd"
  ) %>%
  select(
    gebied,
    compartiment = Compartiment,
    datetime = DateTimeStartAms,
    X_RD = XScanfish,
    Y_RD = XScanfish,
    turbidity = TURBIDScanfish,
    chlfa = Chl_Frrf_Recalc,
    salinity = SALNTTScanfish,
    Kd,
    source,
    license,
    method,
    date_added,
    script
  ) %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(
      turbidity,
      chlfa,
      salinity,
      Kd
    ), 
    names_to = "parameter", 
    values_to = "value"
  ) %>%
# add units
  mutate(
    unit = case_match(
      parameter,
      "O2" ~ "mg/l",
      "chlfa" ~ "ug/l",
      "pH" ~ "pH_units",
      "perc_O2" ~ "%",
      "salinity" ~ "PSU",
      "turbidity" ~ "NTU",
      "Kd" ~ "/m"
    )
  )

```



```{r}
source("../functions/save_functions.R")
write2CSV_pp(outData, "rws_env.csv")
```
